org.hibernate.validator
Interface MessageInterpolator

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMessageInterpolator, DefaultMessageInterpolatorAggregator
public interface MessageInterpolator

Responsible for validator message interpolation (variable replacement etc) this extension point is useful if the call has some contextual informations to interpolate in validator messages

Author:
Emmanuel Bernard

Method Summary
 String interpolate(String message, Validator validator, MessageInterpolator defaultInterpolator)
          Interpolate a given validator message.
 

Method Detail

interpolate

String interpolate(String message,
                   Validator validator,
                   MessageInterpolator defaultInterpolator)
Interpolate a given validator message. The implementation is free to delegate to the default interpolator or not.
